name: Input
description: A text input field component for user data entry with support for validation states

accessibility.screenReader: Announces as a text input with label. Error messages are announced via aria-describedby. Required state is announced when applicable.

recommendedUsage: Use for single-line text entry in forms. Pair with labels and helper text for accessibility.
antiPatterns: Do not use for multi-line text - use Textarea component instead. Always provide a visible or accessible label.
